modName: BodySlide Support for Noble Female Clothes Non-replacer
summary: This mod adds support for Caliente\'s Bodyslide 1.4 to Noble Female Clothes Non-replacer by Merilia and Karmoth
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds support for Caliente\'s Bodyslide 1.4 to Noble Female Clothes Non-replacer by Merilia and Karmoth.

It requires (in order of installation)
1. Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
2. Calientes BodySlide v1-4-0  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
3. Calientes Vanilla Outfits for CBBE http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12273
4. Noble Female Clothes Non-replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6544
5. And finally this mod

Notes:
This mod inherits the standard Caliente Body Presets, so any of your own presets that support vanilla outfits will work.

I have created two SliderGroups, one is just for batch updating Noble Clothes and the other integrates with all of Caliente\'s clothes. This means you can easily add the noble clothes if you already use BodySlide, but that they are include when ever you batch update all of the clothes

If you wish to revert to vanilla noble clothes after using Bodyslide you will have to uninstall and reinstall \'Noble Female Clothes Non-replacer by Merilia and Karmoth\'. This will restore the original Meshes.

If you are offended by the very large bust in the screenshots this is only for illustration purposes to show that this supports Caliente\'s smallest and largest sizes. If you do not want your character to look like this you do not have to use those sliders.

I have permission for this mod from Merilia.
author: Neogunbuster

files.name: BodySlide Support for Noble Female Clothes
